A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Turning into an awful Marvel-esque series very quickly. A sad degeneration from the greatness of Episode VII. Hopefully the writers and directors get the hint that this movie was a disgrace to the series and fix it before the next episode. They didn't even have the decency to let go of Carrie Fisher's character when given the opportunity early in the plot. An awful movie by itself but even worse when considering its place in the series as a whole.
